subject: Re: [OT] DBC semantics (was Re: About the value of    JUnit)
msgSnippet: ... From what I understand of DBC, I m not sure that this would be a precise enough contract.  I think I could pretty easily write a bad implementation that
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> I suppose that contract could be:
>
> 0 <= newCollection.size - oldCollection.size <= 1
>

From what I understand of DBC, I'm not sure that this would be a
precise enough contract. I think I could pretty easily write a bad
implementation that always meets the contract: never add the object to
the container, so new.size()-old.size() always equals 0.

Paul Christmann
